paths: Initial assessment of patient with excessive hair growth in a male pattern -> Perform a history and physical examination to assess the severity of hirsutism -> Hirsutism is moderate or severe -> Measure plasma testosterone and free testosterone in the early morning -> Testosterone level is high -> Idiopathic hirsutism: the most common diagnosis after other disorders are excluded by clinical or laboratory features. -> Spironolactone, Oral contraceptive
